entry.title: WIND WARNING , Baccaro Point
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:48 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baccaro Point 5:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023
Temperature: 3.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 3.3°C
Wind: ENE 68 km/h gust 87 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to plus 3 this evening then steady. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 along parts of the coast early this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 early this evening. Temperature rising to plus 3 this evening then steady. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High 6.
entry.summary: Showers. Fog patches. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming north 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to periods of snow in the evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast late in the evening and overnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023
